title: Upgrade your business hardware in 2021 with Dell’s new year sale
author: techradar-pro
summary: Get your 2021 off to a great start with these great deals from Dell Technologies
article: With 2020 now finally behind us, it's time to look forward to the new year and see what 2021 can bring you and your business.

Along with new year's resolutions, this is the perfect time to look at refreshing and upgrading your business technology. Luckily Dell Technologies has a whole selection of great deals and offers designed to help kit out your organisation, whether you're a start-up going into business in 2021, or a small business looking for that extra boost to grow.
So whatever your hardware needs, Dell Technologies has you covered with top savings on laptops, desktops, servers and much more to help give your business that extra boost in 2021.
Dell's New Year sale for businesses is now on, running from January 4th to February 3rd.

There's top deals available on many of the company's most powerful laptops, perfect for home working, including the top-of-the-line XPS 13 and 15 range, this could be an ideal time to upgrade your work device. What’s more, from the 18th-21st January, you can save up to £300 on the new XPS 15.
And if you're after something a bit more powerful, several of Dell's workstations will also see significant savings, with desktop units of all specs also on offer.

If you're looking to boost your home office, there's also great savings for a number of Dell monitors, offering you the chance to add an extra screen or display to your working set-up with 22-inch screens available from £74.99.

For those looking to expand their computing capabilities, there are also a number of offers on Dell's top server hardware, from entry racks to top PowerEdge servers and more, allowing you to boost your computing power and move further into the cloud.
Along with these great deals, you can also save more using Dell Rewards - the company's loyalty scheme designed especially for UK small business customers.

The program, which is free to join, means you'll earn a £15 Dell Rewards coupon for every £500 spent, which can then be redeemed against future purchases, allowing you to save even more. Dell Rewards customers also get sneak peeks and alerts on exclusive offers, early access to sales and product announcements from Dell Technologies. Interested? Sign up here.

And if you aren't exactly sure what you need to help your business grow and succeed, you can speak to one of the Dell Technologies Advisor team, who can offer you free, one-to-one advice on all of your tech requirements.

The Dell Technologies Advisor team are real people, offering professional, tailored advice to keep your small business ready for what’s next. You can give them a call on 0800 085 4878 or visit dell.co.uk/advisor.
